EmailTemplate.subject: Trust Honeywell to Exceed Your Inertial Sensing Needs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sGWuTsv5rBs]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
At Honeywell, we understand trust is a huge factor when choosing your next IMU or navigator. Knowing you're getting a product true to its advertised specs is key and working with a team you can rely on for product support is critical <[[https://youtu.be/uG_EXPMxWgg]]>.
Fortunately, our try before you buy program* allows you to test our products for up to 30 days.
To get started, simply:
- Provide us your contact and shipping information. - Tell us a little more about how you intend to test our products. - We’ll ship the unit to you at no cost. - Test the product and call us if you have any questions. - When you’re ready to return it, simply use the same box and the return label we send you and let us know how it worked.
It’s that easy.
Learn more about Try Before You Buy Program and our HGuide inertial sensors and navigators to get started today.
LEARN MORE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/IMU_V1.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_imu_gh&utm_content=marketo]]>
*Try before you buy program is subject to availability and execution of Honeywell’s bailment agreement. Limit one (1) product per customer. Customer must return unit in 30 days from the time the unit is received. Customers who do not return the unit within 30 days will be charged full MSRP at standard Honeywell terms and conditions.
